description: This elegant and fragrant seafood stew with prawns makes a perfect dinner party main course served with crusty bread.
name: Seafood Stew with Prawns Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add the mussels and prawns, cover and cook for 3 minutes, shaking a couple of times. Stir in the hake cover and cook for 5-6 minutes until the prawns are opaque and the mussels are open. Discard any closed mussels and serve.
